data.message: BrandForge MVP E2E testing: Full E2E test passed: (1) Homepage renders with all features, (2) User registration/login works with JWT auth, (3) Project creation auto-generates BrandKit, (4) Brand kit update increments version, (5) Template packs API returns 5 templates, (6) Batch creation generates 15 assets (3 rows × 5 templates), (7) QA engine correctly detects text-overflow, min-font-size, max-line-count, safe-margin violations, (8) Auto-fix attempts font shrinking up to 3 times, (9) PNG renders saved to temp/renders/, (10) Batch status correctly set to READY_FOR_REVIEW. All core functionality verified working.
data.outcome: Full E2E test passed: (1) Homepage renders with all features, (2) User registration/login works with JWT auth, (3) Project creation auto-generates BrandKit, (4) Brand kit update increments version, (5) Template packs API returns 5 templates, (6) Batch creation generates 15 assets (3 rows × 5 templates), (7) QA engine correctly detects text-overflow, min-font-size, max-line-count, safe-margin violations, (8) Auto-fix attempts font shrinking up to 3 times, (9) PNG renders saved to temp/renders/, (10) Batch status correctly set to READY_FOR_REVIEW. All core functionality verified working.
